Inventory: You are carrying: a carrot a flour a block of cheese
Current environment: -= Kitchen =- Of every kitchen you could have walked into, you had to walk into an ordinary one. You can barely contain your excitement. You can see a fridge. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal an oven. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a table. The table is massive. On the table you can see a knife. You make out a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you can see a cookbook. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing. You can see a stove. Now why would someone leave that there? But there isn't a thing on it. There is an open plain door leading east. There is an open patio door leading west. There is an exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is not blocked by one.
